trans-unit.source: Represents an element for associating a semantic value with a phrase in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento para associar um valor semântico uma expressão numa gramática.

trans-unit.source: This object is similar to the `tag` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Este objeto é semelhante para o `tag` elemento definido pelo Consortium World Wide Web (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de voz (SRGS) versão 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> property of this object cannot be script.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>propriedade deste objeto não pode ser script.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> can be of the type <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int32>, or <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>pode ser do tipo <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int32>, ou <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: String values must be enclosed in double quotes.
trans-unit.target: Valores de cadeia devem estar entre aspas.

trans-unit.source: To add semantics as script, use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar semântica como script, utilize <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> classe, especificando um valor para a instância.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor utilizado para definir o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a name and a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> classe, especificando um nome e um valor para a instância.

trans-unit.source: The string used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia utilizada para definir o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The object used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto utilizado para definir o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: name is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: nameé uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o nome do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Name to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: É efetuada uma tentativa para definir o nome como <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Name to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: É efetuada uma tentativa para definir o nome como uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor contido no <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The valid types for the Value property are: - <xref:System.Boolean> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.String>
trans-unit.target: Os tipos válidos para a propriedade Value são:- <xref:System.Boolean>- <xref:System.Double>- <xref:System.Int32>- <xref:System.String></xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O valor contido no <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: É efetuada uma tentativa para definir o valor <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Value to an invalid type.
trans-unit.target: É efetuada uma tentativa para definir o valor para um tipo inválido.
